title: I'm Kind to Me
description: Kindness is one of the most important skills people can have. In I'm Kind to Me, Cody shows kindness to his friends as they prepare for their school musical. However, he has a hard time accepting their kindness in return. Read to find out what Cody learns about kindness just in time for their big show. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters and how to recognize and use antonyms.
